thread.title: Barbara Bush Dies at Age 92

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: Barbara Bush Dies at Age 92
text:
Barbara Pierce Bush went from a privileged childhood to become the wife of one president and mother of another, serving throughout as a pugnacious guardian of what had become America’s most prominent political family.
Mrs. Bush died Tuesday at the family’s home in Houston at the age of 92, a family spokesman said, with her husband, former President George H. W. Bush, at her side. Her death came two days after the spokesman said she was in failing health and had decided not to seek additional medical treatment.
